thread.title: BRIEF-American Renal Associates & Its Unit Are Defendants In Lawsuit

title: BRIEF-American Renal Associates & Its Unit Are Defendants In Lawsuit
text:
March 28, 2018 / 1:10 PM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-American Renal Associates & Its Unit Are Defendants In Lawsuit Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
March 28 (Reuters) - American Renal Associates Holdings Inc : 
* AMERICAN RENAL ASSOCIATES - CO’S UNIT & ITS UNIT ARE DEFENDANTS IN A LAWSUIT INITIALLY FILED ON JULY 1, 2016 BY 3 AFFILIATES OF UNITEDHEALTH GROUP 
* AMERICAN RENAL ASSOCIATES SAYS ON MARCH 27, U.S. COURT ENTERED ORDER GRANTING THE MOTION TO DISMISS IN PART & DENYING THE MOTION IN PART - SEC FILING 
* AMERICAN RENAL ASSOCIATES - U.S. COURT ENTERED THE MARCH 27 ORDER REGARDING THE MOTION FILED UNDER A SECOND AMENDED COMPLAINT BY UNITEDHEALTH ON MARCH 13, 2017 Source text: ( bit.ly/2E0xLt9 ) Further company coverage:
